metadata.title: RHSA-2019:2544: Ansible security update (Moderate)
metadata.description:
Ansible is a simple model-driven configuration management, multi-node deployment, and remote-task execution system. Ansible works over SSH and does not require any software or daemons to be installed on remote nodes. Extension modules can be written in any language and are transferred to managed machines automatically.

The following packages have been upgraded to a newer upstream version: ansible (2.7.13)

Security fix(es):

* Ansible: data disclosure when a password from the prompt contains template characters (CVE-2019-10206)

bugzilla.text: CVE-2019-10206 Ansible: disclosure data when prompted for password and template characters are passed

platform: Red Hat Ansible Engine 2.7 for RHEL 7

criterions.comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7 is installed
ansible is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
